scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run setup:zkey && npm run setup:verifier
scripts.compile: mkdir -p artifacts; for circuit in circuits/*.circom; do circom $circuit --r1cs --wasm --sym -o artifacts;done
scripts.setup:zkey: mkdir -p artifacts/zkeys; for circuit in artifacts/*.r1cs; do snarkjs groth16 setup $circuit powersOfTau28_hez_final_15.ptau artifacts/zkeys/$(basename -- $circuit .r1cs).zkey;done
scripts.setup:verifier: mkdir -p artifacts/verifiers; for zkey in artifacts/zkeys/*.zkey; do snarkjs zkey export verificationkey $zkey artifacts/zkeys/vkey.json;done
scripts.prove: snarkjs groth16 prove artifacts/zkeys/merkle-tree.zkey artifacts/witness.wtns artifacts/proof.json artifacts/public.json
scripts.verify: snarkjs groth16 verify artifacts/zkeys/vkey.json artifacts/public.json artifacts/proof.json
